io.github.daveho.funwithsound

Class SimpleFigure

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.daveho.funwithsound.SimpleFigure
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Figure, java.lang.Iterable<SimpleFigure>

    public class SimpleFigure
extends java.lang.Object
implements Figure
    A "simple" figure is a combination of Rhythm, Melody, and Instrument. It may be scheduled to be played at a specified beat number (typically, the beginning of a measure).
